title: Ghost Rider: Hell Bent and Heaven Bound (Trade Paperback)
description:
Writer Jason Aaron (WOLVERINE, Scalped) and artist Roland Boschi take Ghost Rider down a blazing new road! Through the years, Johnny Blaze has lost everything to the curse of the Ghost Rider — his family, his life, even his soul. But now, at long last, Johnny finally knows who's responsible for turning him into a flame-headed horror-show on wheels, and he's hitting the road, looking for vengeance and answers — but mostly just vengeance. Collecting GHOST RIDER #20-25.
Parental Advisory …$16.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3017-8
